Uses of Class
battleships.logic.Ship

  • Packages that use Ship 
    Package Description
    battleships.ai  
    battleships.logic  

    • Uses of Ship in battleships.ai

      Methods in battleships.ai that return Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ship ShipBuilder.buildShip(int cx, int cy, int orientation, int size)
      Method creates a single ship according to parameters and returns it.
      Methods in battleships.ai with parameters of type Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Ai.feedback(Boolean hit, Ship ship, int x, int y)
      Method receives the results of latest turn as parameters and updates the class variables accordingly.

    • Uses of Ship in battleships.logic

      Methods in battleships.logic that return Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ship[][] Player.getLocations()
      Method returns the array containing the locations of the players fleet.
      Ship Battleships.play(int x, int y)
      Method calls the shoot() method of the opponent to shoot at the opponent's fleet.
      Ship Player.shoot(int x, int y)
      Method compares the coordinates received as variables to the location map of player's fleet.
      Methods in battleships.logic that return types with arguments of type Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<Ship> Player.getShips()
      Method returns a list containing the player fleet of Ships.
      Methods in battleships.logic with parameters of type Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Boolean Player.addShip(Ship ship)
      Method adds the parameter Ship to the list of Ships and adds its location information to the map after making sure the Ship is valid.
      abstract void Player.feedback(Boolean hit, Ship ship, int x, int y)
      Method receives the results of latest turn as parameters and updates the class variables accordingly.
      void Person.feedback(Boolean hit, Ship ship, int x, int y)
      Method receives the results of latest turn as parameters and updates the class variables accordingly.
      void Player.negateSurroundingAreaAfterSinking(Ship ship)
      Method automatically changes the values of squares on enemy map adjacent to a sunken ship to -1.
      Boolean Battleships.newShip(Ship ship)
      Method delivers a new Ship to player1 until player1's fleet is full, then continues to deliver new Ships to player2 until their fleet is full.
